name: Stand up for gray
description:
"Stand up for gray," 2022, 1920x1080 MP4 video, 15s
What does the color gray mean to you?  I use grayscale in my work to express spectrum.  I a world of binaries, we often forget the states in between.  For me, gray represents transition, always in movement.  In my work, I want to invite the viewer in for a moment of introspection, and grayscale provides a place where our senses are not overstimulated.  In a sense, it gives us a rest from the typical vibrant and flashing digital world. See more at www.laladrona.com
